main event: A series of blue flashes were observed moving across the horizon in Xenia, Ohio on July 6, 1963.
interesting points: The observation lasted for less than one minute., The flashes were spaced about 3-5 seconds apart., Approximately 15 to 20 blue flashes were seen., The object was visually similar to a starlike shape with no sound., The sighting occurred under scattered clouds.
sighted object: a single object emitting blue flashes
witness description: The observer was lying on a chase lounge in the backyard of his home facing west.
